it.apice.sapere.management
Interface ReactionManager

All Superinterfaces:
SAPEREAgent, Subscriber
All Known Implementing Classes:
ReactionManagerImpl
public interface ReactionManager
extends SAPEREAgent

This interface models the entity responsible of handling eco-laws.

After an initialization phase in which eco-laws can be added and/or removed it provides scheduling logic.

Author:
Paolo Contessi
